00035 void groupMotorControlCallback(const epos_manager::GroupEPOSControl::ConstPtr& msg)
00036 {
00037         vector<epos_manager::EPOSControl> controlGroup;
00038         controlGroup = msg->motor_group;
00039 
00040         for(unsigned int i=0; i< controlGroup.size();i++){
00041                 int key = nodeIDMap.find(controlGroup[i].node_id)->second;
00042                 if (key >=0){
00043                                 switch(controlGroup[i].control_mode){
00044 
00045                                 case epos_manager::EPOSControl::VELOCITY :
00046                                         motors[key]->setVelocity(controlGroup[i].setpoint);
00047                                         break;
00048                                 case epos_manager::EPOSControl::ABSOLUTE_POSITION:
00049                                         motors[key]->setPosition(controlGroup[i].setpoint,true,false);
00050                                         break;
00051 
00052                                 case epos_manager::EPOSControl::ABSOLUTE_POSITION_IMMEDIATE:
00053                                         motors[key]->setPosition(controlGroup[i].setpoint,true,true);
00054                                         break;
00055 
00056                                 case epos_manager::EPOSControl::RELATIVE_POSITION:
00057                                         motors[key]->setPosition(controlGroup[i].setpoint,false,false);
00058                                         break;
00059 
00060                                 case epos_manager::EPOSControl::RELATIVE_POSITION_IMMEDIATE:
00061                                         motors[key]->setPosition(controlGroup[i].setpoint,false,true);
00062                                         break;
00063 
00064                                 default:
00065                                         break;
00066                                 }
00067                 }
00068 
00069         }
00070 }

00072 void motorControlCallback(const epos_manager::EPOSControl::ConstPtr& msg) {
00073         int key = nodeIDMap.find(msg->node_id)->second;
00074                         switch (msg->control_mode) {
00075 
00076                         case epos_manager::EPOSControl::VELOCITY:
00077                                 motors[key]->setVelocity(msg->setpoint);
00078                                 return;
00079                         case epos_manager::EPOSControl::ABSOLUTE_POSITION:
00080                                 motors[key]->setPosition(msg->setpoint, true, false);
00081                                 return;
00082 
00083                         case epos_manager::EPOSControl::ABSOLUTE_POSITION_IMMEDIATE:
00084                                 motors[key]->setPosition(msg->setpoint, true, true);
00085                                 return;
00086 
00087                         case epos_manager::EPOSControl::RELATIVE_POSITION:
00088                                 motors[key]->setPosition(msg->setpoint, false, false);
00089                                 return;
00090 
00091                         case epos_manager::EPOSControl::RELATIVE_POSITION_IMMEDIATE:
00092                                 motors[key]->setPosition(msg->setpoint, false, true);
00093                                 return;
00094 
00095                         default:
00096                                 return;
00097                         }
00098                 }

00101 void motorInfoCallback(const ros::TimerEvent&){
00102         epos_manager::GroupMotorInfo msg;
00103         vector<epos_manager::MotorInfo> motor_group;
00104         short current;
00105         long velocity,position;
00106         for(int i=0;i<numMotors;i++){
00107                 if (motors[i]->isEPOSInitialized()) {
00108                         epos_manager::MotorInfo motor_msg;
00109                         motors[i]->getState();
00110                         if (motors[i]->state == ST_FAULT) {
00111                                 motors[i]->printFaults();
00112                         }
00113                         else {
00114                                 motor_msg.node_id = motors[i]->getNodeID();
00115                                 motor_msg.motor_name = motors[i]->getMotorName();
00116                                 if(motors[i]->getCurrent(&current))
00117                                         motor_msg.motor_current = current;
00118                                 if(motors[i]->getPosition(&position))
00119                                         motor_msg.motor_position = position;
00120                                 if(motors[i]->getVelocity(&velocity))
00121                                         motor_msg.motor_velocity = velocity;
00122                                 motor_msg.state = motors[i]->state;
00123                                 motor_msg.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00124                                 motor_group.push_back(motor_msg);
00125 
00126                                 //Publish single message
00127                                 motorInfoPublisher.publish(motor_msg);
00128                         }
00129                 }
00130         }
00131 
00132         msg.motor_group=motor_group;
00133 
00134         //Publish messages as group
00135         groupMotorInfoPublisher.publish(msg);
00136 }
00137 
00138 void heartbeatTimerCallback(const ros::TimerEvent&){
00139         heartbeatAttempts++;
00140         if(heartbeatAttempts >= maxHeartbeatAttempts){
00141                 if (heartbeatAttempts == maxHeartbeatAttempts) ROS_ERROR("Heartbeat monitor failed: Stopping Motorscd...");
00142                 for(int i =0; i<numMotors;i++){
00143                         motors[i]->setVelocity(0);
00144                 }
00145         }
00146         else{
00147                 std_msgs::String msg;
00148                 msg.data="Okay";
00149                 heartbeatPublisher.publish(msg);
00150         }
00151 }
00152 
00153 void heartbeatListenerCallback(const std_msgs::String::ConstPtr& msg){
00154         heartbeatAttempts=0;
00155 }

00164 bool initializeKeyHandle(){
00165         std::string port = "USB0";
00166         std::string protocol = "USB";
00167         ros::param::get("~Port",port);
00168         ros::param::get("~Protocol",protocol);
00169         keyHandle = NULL;
00170 
00171         /*
00172          * Now it is time to open the device. Often times, the EPOS will not open at first call, so
00173          * we run it in a loop to make sure it is initialized. If it does not initialize within 20
00174          * tries, then there is likely a connection error
00175          */
00176         int numAttempts=0;
00177         while (keyHandle ==0){
00178                 keyHandle = VCS_OpenDevice("EPOS2", "MAXON SERIAL V2", (char*) protocol.c_str(),(char*) port.c_str(), &errorCode);
00179                 if (numAttempts++>20){
00180                         ROS_ERROR("Device Could Not Be Opened...");
00181                         return false;
00182                 }
00183         }
00184         ROS_INFO("Device Opened");
00185 
00186         /*
00187          * Once the device is connected, we must set the baudrate and timeout. Again, we put this
00188          * in a loop to make sure it succeeds.
00189          */
00190         numAttempts=0;
00191         while(!VCS_SetProtocolStackSettings(keyHandle, 1000000, 500, &errorCode)){
00192                 if(numAttempts++ > 20){
00193                         ROS_ERROR("Connection Failed...");
00194                         return false;
00195                 }
00196         }
00197         return true;
00198 }
00199 
00201 int main(int argc, char** argv){
00202 
00203         double motorInfoPublishRate=.1;
00204         bool heartbeat=false;
00205         int heartbeatFreq=10;
00206         maxHeartbeatAttempts=5;
00207         heartbeatAttempts=0;
00208         errorCode=0;
00209 
00210 
00211         motors = new EPOS*[numMotors];
00212 
00213         numMotors = argc-3;
00214 
00215         ros::init(argc, argv, "motors");
00216         ros::NodeHandle nh;
00217         ros::param::get("~Publish_Rate",motorInfoPublishRate);
00218 
00219         ros::param::get("~Heartbeat",heartbeat);
00220         if(heartbeat){
00221                 ros::param::get("~Heartbeat_Rate",heartbeatFreq);
00222                 ros::param::get("~Max_Heartbeat_Attempts",maxHeartbeatAttempts);
00223         }
00224         if(!initializeKeyHandle()) ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Keyhandle not initialized");
00225 
00226         for( int i=1;i<numMotors+1;i++){
00227                  ros::NodeHandle newNode(nh,argv[i]);
00228                  motors[i-1]=new EPOS(newNode);
00229                  if(!motors[i-1]->initializeMotor(keyHandle)){
00230                          ROS_ERROR("Error Initializing Motor %d", motors[i-1]->getNodeID());
00231                          nodeIDMap[motors[i-1]->getNodeID()] = -1;
00232                  }
00233                  else {
00234                          nodeIDMap[motors[i-1]->getNodeID()] = i-1;
00235                  }
00236          }
00237 
00238         //Initialize publishers and subscribers
00239         ros::Subscriber groupMotorControl = nh.subscribe("Group_Motor_Control", 1, groupMotorControlCallback);
00240         ros::Subscriber motorControl      = nh.subscribe("Motor_Control", 4, motorControlCallback);
00241         groupMotorInfoPublisher                   = nh.advertise<epos_manager::GroupMotorInfo>("Group_Motor_Info",10);
00242         motorInfoPublisher                                = nh.advertise<epos_manager::MotorInfo>("Motor_Info",10);
00243         ros::Timer motorInfoTimer                 = nh.createTimer(ros::Duration(1/motorInfoPublishRate), motorInfoCallback);
00244 
00245         if(heartbeat){
00246                 ros::NodeHandle globalNh(ros::names::parentNamespace(nh.getNamespace()));
00247                 heartbeatListener  = globalNh.subscribe("/Heartbeat",10,heartbeatListenerCallback);
00248                 heartbeatPublisher = nh.advertise<std_msgs::String>("Status",10);
00249                 heartbeatTimer  = nh.createTimer(ros::Duration(1/heartbeatFreq), heartbeatTimerCallback);
00250         }
00251 
00252         ros::spin();
00253         for(int i=1; i<numMotors+1;i++){
00254                 motors[i-1]->setVelocity(0);
00255                 delete[] motors[i-1];
00256         }
00257         VCS_CloseDevice(keyHandle,&errorCode);
00258 
00259 
00260 }
